CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins is arc {East Rovers}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins is arc {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Rovers} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Edwardsborough Bulls in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Rebeccaview Dolphins to South Stars in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and East Rovers in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and East Rovers is {427}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Edwardsborough Bulls and South Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Edwardsborough Bulls and South Stars is {400}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from East Rovers?
SC.A: The total flow output from East Rovers is {882}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by South Stars?
SC.A: The total flow input by South Stars is {1155}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 472? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {517} from {South Stars} to {East Rovers}, a flow of {597} from {East Rovers} to {South Stars}, a flow of {542} from {South Stars} to {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 159? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {83} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {158} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 284 and 413? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {285} from {East Rovers} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {400} from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {South Stars}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Rebeccaview Dolphins to South Stars or from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Edwardsborough Bulls?
NC.A: The flow from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Edwardsborough Bulls} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Edwardsborough Bulls, from Rebeccaview Dolphins to South Stars, or from South Stars to Edwardsborough Bulls?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Edwardsborough Bulls} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Rovers} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Edwardsborough Bulls, Arc South Stars, Arc East Rovers, Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins}.
